languages.text: "Помимо нарушенного сообщения, Даргонус некоторое время назад подвергся набегу врагов Человечества. Однако флот под командованием капитана Мартиуса Версериана одержал победу над проклятыми ксеносами. Если вам интересно мое мнение — мы держим ситуацию под полным контролем".

traits.locale_text: "Помимо нарушенного сообщения, Даргонус некоторое время назад подвергся набегу врагов Человечества. Однако флот под командованием капитана Мартиуса Версериана одержал победу над проклятыми ксеносами. Если вам интересно мое мнение — мы держим ситуацию под полным контролем".

languages.text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."
languages.original_text: "Помимо нарушенного сообщения, Даргонус некоторое время назад подвергся набегу врагов Человечества. Однако флот под командованием капитана Мартиуса Версериана одержал победу над проклятыми ксеносами. Если вам интересно мое мнение — мы держим ситуацию под полным контролем".

traits.locale_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

"Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

"Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

"Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

"Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

languages.text: “除了通讯中断之外，达戈努斯最近还遭到了人类之敌的袭击。不过，在马修斯·韦尔森舰长的指挥下，舰队战胜了该死的异形。如果您想问我对这件事情的看法，我认为，我们已经完全控制住了局势。”
languages.original_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

traits.locale_text: “除了通讯中断之外，达戈努斯最近还遭到了人类之敌的袭击。不过，在马修斯·韦尔森舰长的指挥下，舰队战胜了该死的异形。如果您想问我对这件事情的看法，我认为，我们已经完全控制住了局势。”

languages.text: «Además de las interferencias en las comunicaciones, Dargonus fue asaltado por los enemigos de la Humanidad hace poco. Sin embargo, la flota al mando del capitán Marthius Werserian derrotó a los malditos xenos. Si quiere saber mi opinión, tenemos la situación plenamente controlada».
languages.original_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

traits.locale_text: «Además de las interferencias en las comunicaciones, Dargonus fue asaltado por los enemigos de la Humanidad hace poco. Sin embargo, la flota al mando del capitán Marthius Werserian derrotó a los malditos xenos. Si quiere saber mi opinión, tenemos la situación plenamente controlada».

languages.text: 「通信が途絶えた以外にも、ダルゴナスは最近、人類の敵から襲撃を受けました。ですが、マルティウス・ウェルザリアン中隊長率いる艦隊が呪われた異種族たちに勝利しました。この件に関して私の意見を求めるのであれば、状況は完全に制圧されていると言っていいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

traits.locale_text: 「通信が途絶えた以外にも、ダルゴナスは最近、人類の敵から襲撃を受けました。ですが、マルティウス・ウェルザリアン中隊長率いる艦隊が呪われた異種族たちに勝利しました。この件に関して私の意見を求めるのであれば、状況は完全に制圧されていると言っていいでしょう」

languages.text: "Abgesehen von der gestörten Kommunikation wurde Dargonus kürzlich von Feinden der Menschheit angegriffen. Doch die Flotte unter dem Befehl von Captain Marthius Werserian triumphierte über die verdammten Xenos. Falls Ihr meine Meinung hören wollt – wir haben die Lage vollständig unter Kontrolle."
languages.original_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

traits.locale_text: "Abgesehen von der gestörten Kommunikation wurde Dargonus kürzlich von Feinden der Menschheit angegriffen. Doch die Flotte unter dem Befehl von Captain Marthius Werserian triumphierte über die verdammten Xenos. Falls Ihr meine Meinung hören wollt – wir haben die Lage vollständig unter Kontrolle."

languages.text: « En dehors des problèmes de communication, Dargonus a également été victime d'un raid d'ennemis de l'humanité. Heureusement, la flotte, sous le commandement du capitaine Marthius Werserian, a triomphé des maudits xénos. Si vous voulez mon avis, je dirais que nous avons la situation sous contrôle. »
languages.original_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

traits.locale_text: « En dehors des problèmes de communication, Dargonus a également été victime d'un raid d'ennemis de l'humanité. Heureusement, la flotte, sous le commandement du capitaine Marthius Werserian, a triomphé des maudits xénos. Si vous voulez mon avis, je dirais que nous avons la situation sous contrôle. »

languages.text: "İletişim kurulamaması dışında, Dargonus geçenlerde İnsanlığın düşmanlarının baskınına uğradı. Neyse ki Kaptan Marthius Werserian'ın komutası altındaki filomuz, uğursuz zenolara karşı zafer kazanmayı başardı. Bu konudaki görüşümü sorarsanız durum tamamen kontrol altında diyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Apart from the disrupted communications, Dargonus was recently raided by enemies of Humanity. However, the fleet, under the command of Captain Marthius Werserian, triumphed over the accursed xenos. If you ask for my opinion on this matter — we have the situation completely under control."

traits.locale_text: "İletişim kurulamaması dışında, Dargonus geçenlerde İnsanlığın düşmanlarının baskınına uğradı. Neyse ki Kaptan Marthius Werserian'ın komutası altındaki filomuz, uğursuz zenolara karşı zafer kazanmayı başardı. Bu konudaki görüşümü sorarsanız, durum tamamen kontrol altında diyebilirim."
